name: LASER CUT CLOCK MAKING WORKSHOP
description:
Make your own Alleva printmaker laser cut clock or use a general laser-cut wooden circular base and paint your own design!!!!!

This workshop is sure to get the creative juices flowing as Katie introduces you to a variety of techniques that can be utilised to painting/design your clock face.

Learn how to:

* design your clock face
* hand paint, screen-print or spray paint your clock face
* attach the clock mechanism

WHERE: Alleva orintmaker STUDIO WORKSHOP, Mullumbimby, Byron Shire, address supplied when booking is made.

WHEN: 28th Thurday, Januarys 2014, 9.30am - 2.30pm

COST: $85.00

You get supplied with:

One Alleva printmaker pre-cut clock face and one laser cut disc (clock face), two clock mechanisms  

All other equipment is supplied. Feel free to bring your own inspiration to inspire your design. There will be lot's of room for creative play.

Spaces are limited so make a booking now! 

*Bring a packed lunch, coffee, tea, juice and filtered water, morning & afternoon will be provided.

For bookings and enquires contact Katie

katiealleva@gmail.com

or

via the contact section of our shop here: 
http://katiealleva.bigcartel.com/contact

or

*Please Note*  To make a booking to secure your spot please contact me and pay $15. The balance is due 7 days before the workshop date. Alleva printmaker reserves the right to re-book your spot if the full payment has not be made in time.

name: SCREEN-PRINTED LINEN SCARF WORKSHOP
description:
Have you ever wanted to create your own funky screen printed linen scarf?

This workshop is for you. Spend the morning designing a simple stencil cut. Be inspired by nature or by the images and inspiration you bring to the workshop.

Later, learn to print directly onto these luscious linen summer scarves. As we watch them dry on the line you may like to hit the drawing boards and design another.

Learn how to:

   * design a motif
   * create a one/two colour stencil cut screen print
   * screen print directly onto linen scarf
   

WHERE: ADDRESS TO BE ANNOUNCED!

WHEN: 18th Saturday January, 2014, 9.30am - 3.30pm

COST: $85.00

You get supplied with:

2 beautiful linen scarves and can purchase more on the day for $25 each 

All other equipment is supplied. Feel free to bring your own fabrics to experiment with on the day. There will be lot's of room for creative play and a sewing machine present if you feel the urge to whip up a unique scarf.

Spaces are limited so make a booking now!
*Bring a packed lunch, coffee, tea, morning & afternoon will be provided.

For bookings and enquires contact Katie 

katiealleva@gmail.com

or

Call Katie now to secure your spot as places really are limited as this class is designed to be small.

name: RELIEF PRINTING - GRAPE VINE LEAVES
description:
Katie Alleva will guide you through an intensive printmaking workshop focusing on the beauty and immediacy of 'relief printing'. 

Inspired by the immediate environment, Alleva will utilise the grape vine in her backyard to inspire a unique printmaking experience.

Learn how to:

  * create relief prints
  * overlay your relief print on a background
  * utilise nature to create a print on high quality printmaking paper

WHERE: Alleva Printmaker STUDIO WORKSHOP
            Mullumbimby, address provided upon payment or booking

WHEN: 22nd Saturday, February, 2014, 9.30am  - 2.30pm

COST: $85.00


BRING: favourite inks, paints, any flat objects to print (if we have time) any bits of paper, photos, magazine cuttings, flat objects or paper scraps that you wish to collage, poetry, old pages from books, printed musical scores, quotes and things that that inspire you, basically a little box of goodies that could potentially inform your print work. 

Spaces are limited so make a booking now! 
PLEAE NOTE - there is a DEPOSIT option - this allows you to secure a spot. The full fee must be paid two weeks before the workshops commences.

Please bring a packed lunch. Coffee, tea, morning tea and afternoon tea provided.

For bookings and enquires contact Katie 

katiealleva@gmail.com

Each extra pair is $5 each pair

name: Little Birdy Wooden Wall Clock
description:
How about a little clock? Not only is it a little work of art it tells the time too. These clocks are cheerful and a great little size that will fit in a special place on a wall. 

You can rest assured knowing that the wood is entirely sustainable.

The design has been adapted from an original work on paper by Katie Alleva. 

These pieces are not made to be intrusive. At 12 x 12cm they are the perfect size to post in the mail to a friend as a gift or the perfect small art work for your home.

Attached on the back is a small d-clip (so your clock will be ready to hang on the wall) our signature stamp and edition number. Batteries not supplied.

Your clock will be gift wrapped for free. It will be posted securely with a tracking number.

name: Wooden Magpie Wall Clock
description:
How about a little clock? Not only is it a little work of art it tells the time too. These clocks are cheerful and a great little size that will fit in a special place on a wall. 

You can rest assured knowing that the wood is entirely sustainable.

The design has been adapted from a 19th century bird engraving and the outer frame design is adapted from an actual doily.

These pieces are not made to be intrusive. At 12 x 12cm they are the perfect size to post in the mail to a friend as a gift or the perfect small art work for your home.

Attached on the back is a small d-clip (so your clock will be ready to hang on the wall) our signature stamp and edition number. Batteries not supplied.

You can rest assured knowing that the wood is entirely sustainable.

SIZE: 4 x 4cm (from tip of flower) - the perfect size to add a bit of pizazz to your garment. 

Attached on the back is a stainless steel pin.

Your brooch will be gift wrapped for free. It will be posted with a tracking number.

name: 'Birda' - Limited Edition Prints A2
description:
A limited edition of 50 prints.

Each print is signed, titled and dated by Katie Alleva.

A2 GICLEE Archival print on high quality art paper 
– made to order - and printed in Melbourne Australia. 

A Giclee print is the highest quality digital inkjet print produced on art paper.

Please note that the image is not A2 size. The paper size is A2 and we have included a white border, ready for you to frame. 

If you would like your print framed, email me at katiealleva@gmail.com and I will be more then happy to chat about framing options and/or organise framing for you.

‘Birda’ was one of my son’s first words and was one of our first significant painting experiences together. My son started the painting when he was only one year old. He painted the galaxy; an expanding space expressed with gestural strokes, and fingers and feet mushing paint around.

I added a bird and then the tree emerged taking on a life of it’s own with it’s roots embedded into the earth and golden branches outstretched to the sky and space.

He is the galaxy bursting with brightly lit stars, a vast, free and innocent space. The tree is wise and grounding; it is I, the mother, carer, protector, educator, offering life experiences to aid his growth and development. The bird is the spirit or soul, illusive, harmonious, the watcher, the guide, and the whistler of life’s melody.

Collaborating with my son on this artwork has been a special experience, to witness the image unfold over the course of the last year and to celebrate creativity and growth.

Posted in a postal tube, as registered post.

name: 'Birda' - Limited Edition Prints A4
description:
Limited edition 50 prints.

Each print is signed, titled and dated by Katie Alleva.

A4 GICLEE Archival print on high quality art paper 
 – made to order -  and printed in Melbourne Australia. A Giclee print is the highest quality digital inkjet print produced on art paper.

Please note that the image is not A4 size. The paper size is A4 and we have included a white border, ready for you to frame. If you would like your print framed, email me at katiealleva@gmail.com and I will be more then happy to chat about framing options and/or organise framing for you. 

‘Birda’ was one of my son’s first words and was one of our first significant painting experiences together. My son started the painting when he was only one year old. He painted the galaxy; an expanding space expressed with gestural strokes, and fingers and feet mushing paint around.

I added a bird and then the tree emerged taking on a life of it’s own with it’s roots embedded into the earth and golden branches outstretched to the sky and space.

He is the galaxy bursting with brightly lit stars, a vast, free and innocent space. The tree is wise and grounding; it is I, the mother, carer, protector, educator, offering life experiences to aid his growth and development. The bird is the spirit or soul, illusive, harmonious, the watcher, the guide, and the whistler of life’s melody.

Collaborating with my son on this artwork has been a special experience, to witness the image unfold over the course of the last year and to celebrate creativity and growth.

Posted flat.

name: Peace bird - limited edition -
description:
A very special limited edition of 50 birds only will be printed.

Hahnemuhle 125 gram highest quality paper.
Lasercut emboss hand pulled print.
Size: A5

signed by Katie Alleva

name: Camouflage Bird
description:
This bird is unique and is the first in a new experimental series called, Interspace. 

It incorporates gestural brushstrokes of ink on paper. The bird is raised off the picture plan and the space between or the 'interspace' becomes a place of freedom where the bird takes flight through the jungle that is life.

Mixed media and screen print on paper.

A3

Please allow for a 3 week turn around.

www.allevaprintmaker.com
www.facebook.com/Allevaprintmaker

options.name: Professionally framed in White Box Frame

name: Colour Me Happy earrings!
description:
These gorgeous disc stud earrings will be a funky edition to your accessory collection.

Plywood disc, hand painted with surgical stainless steel posts. Disc is 14 mm in diameter and the thickness is 3mm.

Tactile.

Colour. 

Wooden.

Please take care of your earrings even though they are hand painted and lacquered it is recommended you avoid contact with water.

www.allevaprintmaker.com

You can find us on facebook as 'Alleva printmaker.'

Please let us know what colour you would like when you order.
Thanks.

name: 'Bird & Stone' zine
description:
Katie Alleva was invited along with 16 artists by Ms Browns Lounge, to create a zine for the 6th annual Museum of Contemporary Art zine fair, in conjunction with the Sydney writers festival, 2013.

Bird & Stone is a little homage to finding resilience in times of hardship.

It combines original artwork and poetry by Katie Alleva in a simple full colour pull-out C6 booklet. Each zine has an edition number 
(40 made).

Much of the Photoshop work was done by Matthew Gulliford.

The zine was professionally printed.

name: 'Bird of Hope' - Limited Edition
description:
A hand printed woodblock edition of 10 prints by Katie Alleva. Printed in black water based ink on Fabriano 300 gsm printmaking paper. 

This is a significant work that marks the 'changes of the times' and while change can come about easily for some, for others it is a tough battle to overcome a negative inner dialogue or circumstance. That's why this piece is aptly named 'Bird of Hope' as Alleva manifests the gift of hope within the printed image. 

This piece has emerged out of the 'Bird & Stone' zine, by 'Alleva printmaker' that made it's way to the Museum of Contemporary Arts', 6th Annual Zine Fair, in 2013.

Paper size is larger then A3 but image size is approx. 25 cm diameter.
Each print is beautifully signed in lead pencil with the edition number, titled 'Bird of Hope' dated and signed by Katie Alleva. The print will be posted in a wide post tube with tracking number and insurance.

Professionally framed in white of beech total - $274

Tactile.

Black & White. 

Bird, with a message of hope.

www.allevaprintmaker.com

You can find us on facebook as 'Alleva printmaker.'
